m_szDocSumamry: Apple nixes TV, pursues virtual/augmented reality headsets: reports Reprints Billionaire investor Carl Icahn might have to readjust his expectations for Apple ( AAPL ) now that it appears his hopes for an Apple-branded television set have been squashed. Just hours after Icahn posted a bullish note on Apple based on assumptions that Apple would enter the TV and electric car businesses, the Wall Street Journal reported that Apple had shelved its plans for a television more than a year ago.
